name: Security Awareness Training Program Evidence
description: Provide evidence that security awareness training is provided to all employees and contractors, including training completion records, acknowledgments of security policies, and annual refresher training to ensure personnel understand their security responsibilities.
guidance:
The security awareness training evidence should demonstrate that:
i) All new employees receive security awareness training within 30 days of hire as part of onboarding process.
ii) Annual refresher training is provided to all employees to reinforce security awareness and communicate policy updates.
iii) Training completion is tracked with documented completion rates exceeding 95%.
iv) Employees acknowledge receipt and understanding of security policies and procedures.
v) Training materials cover relevant topics including data protection, access control, incident reporting, and acceptable use.

related_controls.name: Control Environment
related_controls.description: Demonstrates commitment to integrity and ethical values.

related_controls.name: Communication and Information
related_controls.description: Uses relevant information to support internal control.

requirements: Security awareness training materials and curriculum
Training completion reports by employee and date
New hire training records showing completion within 30 days
Policy acknowledgment forms or electronic signatures
Training attendance records or learning management system exports
Training effectiveness metrics (quiz scores, completion rates)
acceptance_criteria: 100% of new hires complete security training within 30 days
Policy acknowledgments collected from all employees
Training covers key security topics (phishing, passwords, data handling)
Completion tracked in learning management system
Contractors receive security briefing before system access
data_sources: Google Drive training materials and documents
